trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Amarillo
There were no other sightings in Amarillo on or around September 30th 2013
Summary: Saw it randomly start shootin' up into the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was saying good-bye to my husband as he left for work (7:30am), walked up my stairs into the apartment when I noticed it. Looked like it started in the middle of the sky, it looked beautiful so I took a picture of it. I didn't stick around to see how long it was in the sky for.
